title: Impact of change in USD-euro exchange rate

content.prompt: The United States and the European Union are trading partners with flexible exchange rates. The currency of the United States is the dollar ($), and the currency of the European Union is the euro. Which of the following is true if the exchange rate between the euro and the dollar changes from $1.00 per euro to $1.25 per euro?

choices.label: United States exports to Europe will increase.
European exports to the United States will increase.
The money supply in the United States will increase.

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
